content.rendered:
English Teacher

Reeti is a highly experienced teacher of English Language and Literature with over two decades of experience teaching in the sixth form and higher education sector. In addition to having a Masters in English, she also has a Cambridge CELTA further enhancing her skills as a subject expert. She completed a research course on The Foundations of Middle-earth-Myth, Language and Ideology in J.R.R Tolkien’s Literature from the University of Cardiff.  Currently, she is working in the Click School of English department at Regent College London as an Academic Manager.
